ModMetaData.name: Call of Cthulhu - Cults - Blood of Uvhash A16
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
V1.0 Gameplay expansion for Cults.
You can now: *adds a new deity, Uvhash, the Blood Mad God of the Void *turn your cultists into vampires *extract blood from prisoners and corpses *create bloodstone for crafting *fill blood tanks for storage
